title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. I, pt. 8 - Insider Trading Of Insurance Securities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. I, pt. 8 - Insider Trading Of Insurance Securities

State Regulations
§ 8.0 - Introductory
§ 8.1 - Market-making exemption
§ 8.2 - Exemption of certain transactions effected in connection with a distribution
§ 8.3 - Exemption of certain dispositions effected in connection with an exchange offer

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. I, pt. 8

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 1207, 1221, 1411

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
